name: STABILicers Walk Traction Device - Unisex
description: Great gadgets to keep you from slip-sliding away on the occasional icy patch during shoulder-season or above-the-treeline hikes. These models work best on pure ice, and less well on packed snow.Perimeter rubber compound tensioning system fits most footwear.Three steel plates with protruding cleats are encapsulated in the rubber tensioning system. They’re positioned vertically and horizontally to give traction through a variety of surface angles.(US shoe size) Small fits Men’s 4-7, Women’s 5-8, Medium fits Men’s 7½-10, Women’s 8½-12, Large fits Men’s 10½-13.
